name: Shutter (itch) (Defalt_h3l)
description:
Description

Shutter is a short singleplayer puzzle game.

Patrick is trapped in a seemingly never ending loop of the same office. Solve puzzles to escape the room and learn about Patricks past to find a way out of the loop.

Controls

Move: WASD

Interact:  Left Mouse Button

Crouch: C / Thumb Mouse Button

Inspect: Move Mouse / WASD

Pause Game: P

Credits
  • Voiceacting - Hannah Meyer Cosack, Runa Javed
  • Sounds and Music - Epidemicsound and WeLoveIndies
  • Textures - Polyhaven and ambientCG
